title: Sam and Max is back...
content:
...in webcomic format! Telltale Games, the people working on the next Sam and Max game, now have a Sam and Max webcomic with all-new material drawn by Steve Purcell (the guy who started it all with his indie comic). Check it out:

[url=http://www.telltalegames.com/comics/samnmax/]www.telltalegames.com/comics/samnmax/[/url][url=http://last.fm/users/grafix5000/][img]http://toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobbler.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://toxicsheep.com]toxicsheep.com[/url] | [url=http://commanderkeen.org]coming up next...[/url]

title: Re: Sam and Max is back...
content: The idea about 'interactive' comic is quite neat. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: VG CATS
content:

title: Re: VG CATS
content: How could you decide that from only one strip? I don't like vgcats 'cos I don't understand most of the jokes about games I've never played [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] (and never wanted to)[hr]The human brain is not user-friendly...

title: Re: VG CATS
content:
Yeah! They even refused to put Keen in a comic, even as a washed up game character [[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] ] Even after I nagged em for THREE WEEKS!


Go Maxy!
A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: VG CATS
content:
Hmh, they suck! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img]
Won't read that comic anymore. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: VG CATS
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]I like VG cats better personaly myself, [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] [hr][/quote]
If you are only about 10 as you claim, I imagine there's a fair chunk of more "adult" humour just whizzing right over your head there.

Anyway, the point of this topic was more to inform the people who already liked Sam and Max rather than promote the comic to people who didn't know about it.[url=http://last.fm/users/grafix5000/][img]http://toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobbler.png[/img][/url]

content: Oh pish posh I have no care for R rated comics, I sware! I am ten and I read thoose comics, but some are dumb,
